A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only good thing about this movie is they brought back a character from the originals for one clip. Also\, i guess the new creatures were cool too. No point to this plot. Left with even more questions than answers. Really wish they had followed the ideas the fans had for the plot. They literally followed a path that no one recommended. This was the worst star wars yet. True star wars fans can not be satisfied with this film. It was horrible. Don’t bother going to see it. Maybe rent it on red box for $2 when it comes out.
